text:
Three persons who were allegedly involved in the murder of M. Arumugasamy (32) and A. Kannan — both aides of Subash Pannyar at Pazhayakayal near Tirunelveli a couple of days ago, surrendered at the Judicial Magistrate Court here on Thursday.

The accused – Kannan alias Kandasamy alias M. Kannabiran (36) of Chathiram Pudhukulam near Tirunelveli, Mani alias M. Manikandan (28) of Melakarai and S. Murugan (24) of Padugaiyur near Srivaikuntam, surrendered at the court of Judicial Magistrate, Pudukottai, T. Pushparani.
title: Three surrender
